title: So i'm really bad at this game, and im looking to improve. Please help
body: So I've recently finished a match against intermediate bots and got destroyed. It's been like this basically throughout every game I've played and I'm a little tired of it. I know I'm new to league and MOBAs in general, but I definitely think I'm worse than most when they first start off. Whether I am or not, I'm asking for help. I want to get into good habits early on, so I would love for someone to try and help. Anything I should be doing every game or any general advice would be greatly appreciated. If you even want to go as far as playing with me then that is also helpful and probably the best way to help out. Someone please help :)

replies.body: YouTube, some High Elo streamers, & lots of experience are all nice (:
the thing with watching high elo plays is that sometimes i don't understand what's going on and why they're making certain decisions

When you watch them, ask yourself why they would do that (and watch what the result of their action(s) is). YouTube search Common mistakes high elo players make; it may give you a better idea of what to keep an eye out for. :o Lots of YouTube and Googling can help.

I am willing to play with you but not really gonna teach you but guide you into the right places to get the right advice. If you are ok with that add me.

Also here is a huge advice:

Never listen to bronze, they play worse than you, silver advice take it like a grain of salt.
are they really that bad? haha & i didn't get a request? fyi there's an "i" where the "L" should be in turtle. so it would be redturties
step one:  dont die, not diying is a crucial skill in getting kills/farm and wining games
I needed over 1000 games to get on a decent level, also, i watched Trick2g (only for jungle mains)
try adding "redturties" there's an "i" where the "L" in turtle is haha
readded sorry the forums make it look like an i if your not paying attention
